definition: the rhythmic contraction and expansion of the arteries with each beat of the heart, produce or modulate (as electromagnetic waves) in the form of short bursts or pulses or cause an apparatus to produce pulses
details:
noun
- the rhythmic contraction and expansion of the arteries with each beat of the heart
= synonyms: beat
- (electronics) a sharp transient wave in the normal electrical state (or a series of such transients)
= synonyms: impulse
- edible seeds of various pod-bearing plants (peas or beans or lentils etc.)
- the rate at which the heart beats
= synonyms: pulse rate, heart rate
verb
- produce or modulate (as electromagnetic waves) in the form of short bursts or pulses or cause an apparatus to produce pulses
= example: produce or modulate (as electromagnetic waves) in the form of short bursts or pulses or cause an apparatus to produce pulses
= synonyms: pulsate
- expand and contract rhythmically
= synonyms: throb, pulsate
- drive by or as if by pulsation
= example: drive by or as if by pulsation
